name: SteamFantasy - Unbelievable Korwin Story
description:
You can play demo for free in browser. It is first episode of 5.

Game

    World of game is part of destroyed planet similiar to earth and dimensions connected to it. 
Your story starts in alternate Hungary kingdom when King Korwin send you to save his doughter and bring peace to kingdom.

Hero

    "The next greatest hero" - I mean player need to solve many problems by killing people and monsters. Hero is fairly colorful and outlined character.

World

    SteamFantasy you can see multiverse. This story is about land of a crumbling planet resembling earth at first glance. The game takes place on it and the dimensions connected to it.
    Somewhere in another universe in which physics is less deterministic, connections between elements weaker to such an extent that people can manipulate them - they call it magic.
    Scientists are people who try to make matter propel themselves. They try to improve people and are therefore considered freaks.
Between flying islands people move by means of flying balloons or magical portals, sometimes the islands are connected with each other by a network of underground corridors.
    Story is short, but game tries to humorously approach the topic of storytelling, and the hero himself seems to be a fairly colorful and outlined character. You will find here many references to well-known and liked games such as Gothic, Diablo, Duken Nuken, Dark Souls etc. Which have had a significant impact on me for years.
    You can go through the first chapter in your browser - a playable demo. If you like the game or want to support my future projects, you can buy the full version. Thank you for any feedback.
